fields.label: menu item
fields.name: menu_item
fields.instructions:
classes: white-box (table), colors-table (table), color-examples (table), button (span), photo-credit (span), mobile-stack (table), text-table-row (tr), icon-table-row (tr)
icons: <i class="fas fa-times"></i>, <i class="fas fa-check"></i>
If you wrap a 'color-examples' in a div, the div will have padding and a grey background.

sub_fields.label: button class
sub_fields.name: button_class
sub_fields.instructions: use 'open-form' to open the form modal

sub_fields.label: target
sub_fields.name: target
sub_fields.instructions: _blank for new window or _self for same window

sub_fields.label: button class
sub_fields.name: button_class
sub_fields.instructions: use 'open-form' to open the form modal

fields.label: terms
fields.name: terms
fields.instructions: use class 'open-terms' to open the terms modal window

fields.label: Banner text
fields.name: banner_text
fields.instructions: use class 'open-contact' for contact button. use class 'open-loaner' for loaner button.

sub_fields.label: repeater section class
sub_fields.name: repeater_section_class
sub_fields.instructions:
ex: mobile-only, desktop-only, align-left, align-right, align-center
wraps entire repeater section

sub_fields.label: video embed
sub_fields.name: video_embed
sub_fields.instructions: Embed code goes here. This will override the whole section.

fields.label: buttons
fields.name: buttons
fields.instructions: These buttons will appear on the main dashboard. Use href #dashboard to display the main dashboard.

fields.label: dashboards
fields.name: dashboards
fields.instructions: Additional dashboards. Use href #(dashboard_id) to show the dashboard.

fields.label: tallest button image
fields.name: tallest_button_image
fields.instructions: ex: 45px (this will set a minumum height on all image icon containers)

fields.label: header wysywig
fields.name: header_wysywig
fields.instructions: Use class="button" for buttons. Use class="button alt-hover" for white on black hover state.

sub_fields.label: tags
sub_fields.name: tags
sub_fields.instructions: seperate each tag with a comma (,)

fields.label: promo terms
fields.name: promo_terms
fields.instructions: add id termsbtn to an a tag for modal trigger

sub_fields.label: Image URL
sub_fields.name: image_url
sub_fields.instructions: To use SVG files you can provide the URL to the SVG here.

sub_fields.label: Image Override
sub_fields.name: image_override
sub_fields.instructions: If you don't have access to a web server to upload SVG files - you can convert the file to a PNG or JPG and use this field instead. This will override the Image URL field.

sub_fields.label: Embed URL
sub_fields.name: embed_url
sub_fields.instructions: Go to the youtube page. Click share. Click embed. Use the src attribute for this field.

sub_fields.label: Image URL
sub_fields.name: image_url
sub_fields.instructions: To use SVG files you can provide the URL to the SVG here.

sub_fields.label: Image Override
sub_fields.name: image_override
sub_fields.instructions: If you don't have access to a web server to upload SVG files - you can convert the file to a PNG or JPG and use this field instead. This will override the Image URL field.

fields.label: CTA Image Pre Comp
fields.name: cta_image_pre_comp
fields.instructions: 1154 x 340. This appears on the Exposure Center home page.

fields.label: CTA Image
fields.name: cta_image
fields.instructions: 1154 x 340. This appears on the Exposure Center home page.

fields.label: Home Header Image
fields.name: home_header_image
fields.instructions: 1920x540. This will replace the home page header image. Leave blank to use default.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: button_text
fields.instructions: Optional. Will display "visit website" if empty.

sub_fields.label: button text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: leave blank for default 'Find a Dealer'

sub_fields.label: button link
sub_fields.name: button_link
sub_fields.instructions: if left blank the button link will be 'shop url'

sub_fields.label: button 2 text
sub_fields.name: button_2_text
sub_fields.instructions: leave blank to disable second button

sub_fields.label: Expired Text
sub_fields.name: expired_text
sub_fields.instructions: This text will appear once the promotion has ended or until the next promotion begins.

fields.label: Social
fields.name: social
fields.instructions: Enter full URL for each or leave blank if not applicable.

fields.label: SEO Description
fields.name: seo_description
fields.instructions: 90 to 150 characters. Leave blank to use excerpt

fields.label: Related categories
fields.name: related_categories
fields.instructions: Select 3, these will be shown in order

fields.label: Header
fields.name: header
fields.instructions: This header also appears on the category pages.

fields.label: Highlights
fields.name: featured_articles
fields.instructions: Maximum 6. These also appear in the sidebar of category pages.

fields.label: Sticky posts
fields.name: sticky_post
fields.instructions: Sticky posts will appear first in the filter on the home page only.

fields.label: Header
fields.name: header
fields.instructions: This header also appears on the category pages.

fields.label: Add to filter
fields.name: add_to_filter
fields.instructions: Select date/time if you'd like this to appear in the main filter

fields.label: Tile 6
fields.name: tile_6
fields.instructions:
Desktop: Third Row
Mobile: Fifth Row
100VH

fields.label: Tile 11
fields.name: tile_11
fields.instructions:
Desktop: Last Row
Mobile: Last Row
100VH

title: On The Road XT30 Page Template

title: Reach for New Heights with Michael Clark

sub_fields.instructions: please note there is a 40 character limit to this heading

sub_fields.label: Header Text
sub_fields.name: header_text
sub_fields.instructions: please note there is a 40 character limit to this heading

sub_fields.message: Place this section where you would like the Instagram Gallery to appear. You can change the settings of this feed on the Create Forever home page.
Place this section where you would like the posts belonging to a category to go
Place this section where you would like related stories to appear

Place this section where you would like the Story Submission Form to appear.
Further options for this section can be set on the Create Forever home page

title: Create With Me Competition Challenge Winner

fields.label: Add to filter
fields.name: add_to_filter
fields.instructions: Select date/time if you'd like this to appear in the main filter

fields.label: Hidden?
fields.name: hidden
fields.instructions: This removes the post from the main filter

fields.label: Time
fields.name: read_time
fields.instructions: Enter read time in minutes. Calculate here: http://niram.org/read/

sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Use h2 as subheadings and h3 only when nested under an h2.

sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: 862px wide. Separate copyright and description with | symbol.

sub_fields.name: image_comparison
sub_fields.instructions: 862px wide. Separate copyright and description with | symbol.

sub_fields.label: Portrait?
sub_fields.name: portrait
sub_fields.instructions: Portrait carousels have a limited width.

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: images
sub_fields.instructions: 862px wide. Separate copyright and description with | symbol.

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: images
sub_fields.instructions: 862px wide. Separate copyright and description with | symbol.

sub_fields.label: Youtube embed code
sub_fields.name: video_code
sub_fields.instructions: This is the last string of letters numbers in a YouTube URL. To show the video "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RpsfFqvUo-4"  you would enter "RpsfFqvUo-4" into the box.

sub_fields.label: Caption
sub_fields.name: caption
sub_fields.instructions: Separate copyright and description with | symbol.

fields.label: Forms
fields.name: forms
fields.instructions: Do not select more than one

fields.label: SEO Description
fields.name: seo_description
fields.instructions: 90 to 150 characters. Leave blank to use excerpt
